title: Textile, "Cortes", early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
inscribed: On a rock in the center, "Delmes delin't and sculp't".
dimensions:
Warp: 181.5cm (74 1/4in.)
Weft: 81.5cm (32 in.) (both selvedges present).
Height of repeat: 54cm (21 1/4).
description: Four scenes, each captioned in Fench, showing Cortes in Central America. In purple on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Cortes", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-167.
